etiquetas1.subtitulo: The use of solar panels and a whole compendium of electronic equipment

contenido.bloquetexto: Photovoltaic solar energy is a renewable and clean energy source that uses solar radiation to produce electricity, this can be produced using the different components and solar panels that are presented in the diagram below.

lista.lista2: Solar panels according to the customer's energy needs.
lista.lista3: Inverters and current batteries that allow the recovery and use of energy.

etiquetas2.subtitulo: We automatically generate a water pumping system with solar energy.

contenido.bloquetexto: The pumping system that we have at NaresEnergy is based on a simple principle: The pressure exerted on the surface of a fluid can be recovered through the use of electric energy pumping machinery that is captured with solar panels and allows the execution of each of the required tasks, some components are presented in the diagram below.

lista.lista1: Current controller (Solar and electrical energy) and energy recovery batteries.
lista.lista2: Solar panels according to the customer's energy needs.

etiquetas3.subtitulo: Through copper coils it is possible to heat water using solar energy.

contenido.bloquetexto: The operating system of the non-pressure solar water heater is a passive system based on the thermosiphon principle as an energy saving alternative, it works through solar heating of the tubes, changing the density of the cold water hot and sending the water into a tank.

lista.lista1: Water tank with a capacity of 100 liters up to 300 liters.
lista.lista2: They can be installed both on the roof of your house and in the building or in your basement.
lista.lista3: They can use (solar collector) type panels and these in turn will heat the water in the respective tanks.

advertisement.title: Let's talk is important to us
advertisement.paragraph1: Talk to our customers and build a relationship (B2C or B2B) with us and our customers or other companies.
advertisement.paragraph2: It allows us to generate a level of trust and communication link io in which the transactions of goods or the provision of our services become even better and more effective

misionvision.paragraph1: Nares is an innovator of renewable energy solutions that are manufactured using new technologies, innovative and quality applications, we offer a complete range of hydrogen solar energy products and wind energy products to help customers like you meet the current needs, with its offices in Miami, Florida, Bogotá, Colombia, and Valencia, Venezuela. Nares Energy provides its services to customers in North America and Latin America at a commercial, industrial and residential sector level. To ensure the satisfaction of our customers, we concentrate our efforts on provide excellent service to our consumers, we are dedicated to building long-term relationships with our customers by providing complete solutions from research to delivery and commissioning of solar systems and years of warranty service and support we will help the renewing your personal environment in homes and communities healthy at low energy costs lighting and pumping and heating water a clean and protected environment.
misionvision.paragraph2: We have a wide range of solar heaters for your home, office or industry with a capacity of 100 liters and up. We have simple or split units to be installed both on the roof of the house, building or basement, and also in open areas
misionvision.paragraph3: Renewable, solar and wind energy systems, water extraction pumps for deep wells, solar water heaters directly from the manufacturer we supply and install photovoltaic solar energy systems designed according to the user's needs we supply systems from of 2000 vt installed on site with capacity for homes, communities or industrial use
